group().Description: Returns the group owner of the file.

permissions().Description: Returns the permissions of the file. The file permissions are returned as a set of @B_java#nio#file#attribute#PosixFilePermission_E@ elements. The returned set is a copy of the file permissions and is modifiable. This allows the result to be modified and passed to the @B_java#nio#file#attribute#PosixFileAttributeView#setPermissions_E@ method to update the file's permissions.

owner().Description: Returns the owner of the file.

ClassDesc: File attributes associated with files on file systems used by operating systems that implement the Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX) family of standards. The POSIX attributes of a file are retrieved using a @B_java#nio#file#attribute#PosixFileAttributeView_E@ by invoking its @B_java#nio#file#attribute#PosixFileAttributeView#readAttributes_E@ method.
